health_tech: FHIR integration for health data exchange

evidence.claim: Clover Care utilizes FHIR standards for seamless health data interchange.
The platform adheres to HIPAA regulations for protecting patient information.
Clover Care's systems are designed for interoperability with electronic health records (EHRs).

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of handling X12 transactions or relevant use cases found.
